experience.title: Digital Intern
experience.description: Project:Extraction of text data from medical claim formsâ€¢ Created an end to end model capable of making bounding boxes for identifying certain text blocks in claim forms, using YOLO algorithmâ€¢ Performed benchmarking tests between the object detection models YOLO, fast RCNN and faster RCNN to provide better background for the selection of models for object detection, achieving a decrease in the latency of the model from 4 sec to 50 milisec (1/80 times)â€¢ Worked on removing noise from claim form images with the help of noise filtering algorithms Weiner Filter, Mean filter & guassian filterâ€¢ Explored and prepared documentation for the use of TableNet and Cascade TabNet to extract tabular data from the claim form imagesâ€¢ Successfully deployed a tesseract based text extraction model which could identify handwritten and text data from the bounding boxesâ€¢ Achieved a decrease in latency of 6 sec in the text detection and extraction model, making it commercially usable for forms processing
experience.description_html: Project:Extraction of text data from medical claim formsâ€¢ Created an end to end model capable of making bounding boxes for identifying certain text blocks in claim forms, using YOLO algorithmâ€¢ Performed benchmarking tests between the object detection models YOLO, fast RCNN and faster RCNN to provide better background for the selection of models for object detection, achieving a decrease in the latency of the model from 4 sec to 50 milisec (1/80 times)â€¢ Worked on removing noise from claim form images with the help of noise filtering algorithms Weiner Filter, Mean filter & guassian filterâ€¢ Explored and prepared documentation for the use of TableNet and Cascade TabNet to extract tabular data from the claim form imagesâ€¢ Successfully deployed a tesseract based text extraction model which could identify handwritten and text data from the bounding boxesâ€¢ Achieved a decrease in latency of 6 sec in the text detection and extraction model, making it commercially usable for forms processing

experience.title: Data Analyst Intern
